member.name: T:NetworkInterface.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NetworkInterface.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NetworkInterface.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:NetworkInterface.SessionManager.ConnectAsync(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new connection with server. Only used by Client.

member.name: M:NetworkInterface.SessionManager.StartListen(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Listens for incoming connections. Only used by Server.

member.name: M:NetworkInterface.SessionManager.ListenAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Listens for incoming connections on . Raises the NewConnection event when a new connection is accepted.
member.remarks: This method will raise the event NewConnection indefinitely until the Cancellation Token is cancelled.
